ประ-กอบ_ด้วย.en: to consist of, be composed of

เลี้ยง_แขก.en: to entertain guests, to have a party

เลี้ยง_ดู.en: to give someone a treat / to support, raise

เป็น_ลม.en: to faint, to have a stroke

เห็น_พ้อง.en: to agree, to see the same way as

ยา_หอม.en: powder mixed with water to revive someone

คิด_ออก.en: to remember, recall / to figure out a solution

ตัด_ผม.en: to get a haircut, to cut hair

ผ่า_ตัด.en: to have surgery, to have an operation

ดู_ก่อน.en: wait and see, see what happens

เพื่อน_รัก.en: valued friend, bosom friend, close friend

ใจ_รัก.en: to be extremely fond of, to love, to be bent on

มี_หน้า.en: to dare to, to be shameless

มี_มาก.en: to abound, to be found everywhere

มี_เรื่อง.en: to get into trouble, to quarrel

อยู่_บ้าน.en: to be at home, stay at home

เลี้ยง_ผี.en: to offer sacrifices to a spirit

รู้_ใจ.en: to be intimate / to know the mind

จำ_ลอง.en: to reproduce, make a copy, imitate

ทำ_ใจ.en: to come to terms with, to accept

ทำ_ผิด.en: to make a mistake, do something wrong

ทำ_ให้.en: to cause, to make somebody do something

เหมือน_กับ.en: like, as, such as, as if

อยู่_กับ.en: to be with, stay with, be with

ไป_หา.en: to go to see, visit, meet
